references.reason: This paper is essential as it introduces the GPT-4 model, which is a core component used for reasoning in the FreeGrasp method.

references.paper_title: Do as i can, not as i say: Grounding language in robotic affordances
references.reason: This paper is an important reference in the field of grounding language in robotic affordances, as language grounding is a critical aspect for interpreting human instructions in robotic tasks.

references.paper_title: ThinkGrasp: A Vision-Language System for Strategic Part Grasping in Clutter
references.reason: This is the most important reference as ThinkGrasp is the method being directly compared to in the paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Graspnet-1billion: A large-scale benchmark for general object grasping
references.reason: This paper provides the grasping pose estimation technique utilized in FreeGrasp.
This paper on the SAM segmentation method is important as it serves as an important baseline object segmentation model in the robotic manipulation tasks.
